title: Will Qatar Be Ready for the World Cup?
description: As sports fans prepare to flood the tiny Gulf nation, cranes and loaders are still running hard — as is criticism of Qatar’s human rights record and exploitation of workers.
dc:creator: Christina Goldbaum
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

media:content.media:description: Assembling a sign in Doha, Qatar, ahead of the World Cup. As the tournament draws near, Qatari officials have grown increasingly defensive about outside criticism.
